title: MythicMobs 后台重复报错
author: 余思思
txt_content:
本帖最后由 余思思 于 2018-7-15 10:35 编辑 

就是在玩家攻击一些技能复杂的怪物boss时
后台就会BOOM的一下

[MythicMobs] An error occured while parsing a drop table. Enable debugging for a stack trace.[MythicMobs] An error occured while parsing a drop table. Enable debugging for a stack trace.

replies.author: qsefthuopq
replies.txt_content:
配置出错
需要开启调试模式查看详细报错
